Title: Relates to the transfer of funds from a candidate's political committee for a federal office to a candidate's political committee for a state, county or local office
Summary: Places restrictions on the transfer of funds from a candidate's political committee for a federal office to a candidate's political committee for a state, county or local office.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the transfer of funds from a candidate's political committee for a federal office to a candidate's political committee for a state, county or local office
